dict.acceptation: 伸开；展开；（使）传播；（使）散布；
涂；把…覆盖在…上(over)；把…敲平；散发（气、烟等）；
（景色、景致）展现；传开；（人群）散开；软化；
张开的；[语言学]双唇展开的；（宝石）扁薄发光的；（文章、照片等）跨两栏（或多栏）的；

sent.orig: We will quote an ' all-in' spread that includes both dealing spread and market spread.
sent.trans: 我们的差价报价包括交易差价和市场差价。

sent.orig: Bunchy top disease can spread from plant to plant and it is also spread by aphids.
sent.trans: 束顶病可以通过个体间传播，也可以通过蚜虫传播。

sent.orig: Never spread things. Don't spread gossip, rumor, innuendos, unkindness, malicious words or physical anger.
sent.trans: 不要四处散布。不要散布谣言、闲话。、不友好、伤害的话语或。

sent.orig: Bunchy Top Disease top disease can spread from plant to plant and is also spread aisidsaphids.
sent.trans: 香蕉束顶病能够在作物之间传播，还能经由蚜虫传播。

sent.orig: Bunchy top disease can spread from plant to plant and is also spread by aphids.
sent.trans: 束状植物的疾病可以从植物到植物的扩展，同时也通过蚜虫传染。
